title: Rishi Sunak Wins Contest to be UKâ€™s Next PM and Confront Economic Storm
description: After a period of chaos, Mr. Sunak, a Conservative, faces serious political and economic headwinds. He will be the first person of color and first Hindu to be prime minister.
dc:creator: Mark Landler
media:description: Rishi Sunak, center, outside Conservative Party headquarters in London on Monday.
